data.title: Nikole Flax on status of IRS appeals and enforcement (9:59)
data.meta_description: Nikole Flax shares her takeaways from last week’s Congressional hearing on President Biden's FY25 IRS budget and the 2024 filing season and what companies need to know about current IRS operations.
data.text:
Nikole Flax shares her takeaways from last week’s Congressional hearing on President Biden's FY25 IRS budget and the 2024 filing season and what companies need to know about current IRS operations.

IN THIS EPISODE

Nikole Flax, Principal, PwC’s Tax Controversy and Regulatory Services Practice

Sindhu Blume, Host, Policy on Demand

Scott McCandless, Host, Policy on Demand
